name: WPB Product Size Chart for WooCommerce – Product Size Guide – Size Chart in WooCommerce as PopUp and Tab
author: wpbean

sections.description:
WPB Product Size Chart for WooCommerce is an advanced size guide plugin for WooCommerce store. Size Chart Table can be added to a WooCommerce product page using this plugin. An advanced table generator is included, which allows you to manage the size chart table very easily.

It is also possible to add the size chart table button anywhere on your site using it’s Custom ShortCode or the Elementor page builder. On the click of the button, a nice popup of the size table and content will come out. It is also possible to show the size table and content in the WooCommerce product tab.

Multiple different size charts can be added and set the table for multiple different products or product categories.

The WooCommerce size chart button text, color, size, and placement of the button can be changed from the plugin settings.

How essential is the size chart plugin for WooCommerce?

The size chart plugin for WooCommerce is incredibly essential for e-commerce businesses. It provides customers with vital information about product sizing, helping them make informed purchasing decisions and reducing the likelihood of returns due to size-related issues. This tool enhances the overall shopping experience, builds trust, and ultimately contributes to higher customer satisfaction and increased sales.

DEMO | Support | Documentation | Buy PRO Version

Video Documentation:

Features

  • Add unlimited size charts for WooCommerce product size guide.
  • Size table builder with max 3 columns and 5 rows.
  • Add the size charts to the products based on selected products and it’s categories.
  • Show the size on the product tab or a popup.
  • Settings for choosing the button placement.
  • Size content adjustment settings.
  • Very easy to use.
  • RTL and multi-language ready.

Pro Features

  • WooCommerce add size chart with unlimited numbers of rows and columns.
  • WooCommerce product size chart: Select a pre-made size chart on the product edit page.
  • Multiple table style presets.
  • Advanced button style customization options.
  • Advanced popup style customization options.
  • Elementor widget for size chart.
  • Lifetime free update and support.
  • No yearly renewal required.

WPB Size Chart Support and Documentation:

Using this plugin is super easy as we have details online documentation for this. If you are having any issue with this plugin our expert support team always ready for you. Just open a support ticket on our support forum.
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin.
  • After installing the plugin, activate it. Then go to Dashboard > Size Charts. Configure the plugin settings and save settings.
  • After installing the plugin follow our step by step online documentation.
sections.faq:
Does WPB WooCommerce size chart plugin work with the theme that I am using?

We test this plugin with so many free and premium themes. It should work with any standard WordPress themes. If you are having any issue with your theme, please open a support ticket on our forum. We will fix the issue and release an update for this plugin.

In comparison to YITH Product Size Charts for WooCommerce, why should I use this plugin instead?

YITH is, without a doubt, an excellent add-on. To counter this, our size table generator is lightning-fast and requires no special training to operate. Developed with the help of the Vue Js modern Javascript framework.
